author: Associated Press
title: ‘Very Absurd,’ Says China After Missouri Files Lawsuit Against Country’s Coronavirus Response
description: China on Wednesday slammed a lawsuit brought against it by the U.S. state of Missouri over the coronavirus pandemic as “very absurd.”
content:
(BEIJING) — China on Wednesday slammed a lawsuit brought against it by the U.S. state of Missouri over the coronavirus pandemic as “very absurd.”
Foreign ministry spokesman Geng Shuang said the legal action has “no factual and legal basis at all” and repeate… [+1764 chars]
